snippet.title: Swords - First 15 Minutes -Wii Motion Plus-  Nintendo Wii
snippet.description:
Swords Wii

Pros: The idea of the game was good ...

Cons: ... But really badly exploited.

Wii Motion Plus, exploited very badly.

Graphics ridiculous

Save money, still play Wii Sports Resort Chambara.

---------------------------------------------------



Pro: L'idea del gioco era ottima...


Contro: ... Ma sfruttata veramente male.

Wii motion plus, sfruttato molto male.

Grafica ridicola

Risparmiate i soldi, giocate ancora a wii sports resort Chambara.
